about_the_game:
Break Bricks, Die, Repeat until  you beat the first Boss. This demo includes some of the levels , perks and upgrades full game has. But you can only progress until the first boss.

All games modes are locked except the Classic Rogue-like mode.
detailed_description:
Break Bricks, Die, Repeat until  you beat the first Boss. This demo includes some of the levels , perks and upgrades full game has. But you can only progress until the first boss.

All games modes are locked except the Classic Rogue-like mode.
name: Rogue Bricks Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: 2 Cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: 2 Cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
